item.title: Taylor expansions: An easy derivation
item.description: Introduction Recently I had to bound the error in a Taylor expansion. However I forgot the form of the error term, so I had to look it up. This was not the first time I’ve had to look it up. In fact, though I first learned about Taylor expansions in 2014, for the past 7 years I have never been able to remember the remainder formula. So, I decided to re-derive Taylor expansions in a way I can finally remember.
